blocks.name: r19.32
blocks.content: Theorem 19.32 of [Margaris] p. 90 with restricted quantifiers, analogous to ~ r19.32v . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 29-Jun-2017.)

blocks.name: rexsb
blocks.content: An equivalent expression for restricted existence, analogous to ~ exsb . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  cbvrex(s0, s1, c0, w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))
  nfv(s1, w0)
  nfa1(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))
  impbid(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))
  ax12v(s0, s1, w0)
  com12(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), w0)
  sp(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rexsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∃(s0 ∈ c0, w0)↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s0,(s0 = s1 → w0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  cbvrex(s0, s1, c0, w0, ∀(s0,(s0 = s1 → w0)))
  nfv(s1, w0)
  nfa1(s0, (s0 = s1 → w0))
  impbid(s0 = s1, w0, ∀(s0,(s0 = s1 → w0)))
  ax12v(s0, s1, w0)
  com12(s0 = s1, ∀(s0,(s0 = s1 → w0)), w0)
  sp(s0, (s0 = s1 → w0))
}

blocks.name: rexrsb
blocks.content: An equivalent expression for restricted existence, analogous to ~ exsb . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexrsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c0, wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  bitri(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c0, wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))), wrex(s1, c0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
  rexsb(s0, s1, c0, w0)
  rexbiia(s1, c0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))
  impbid2(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))
  alral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))
  com12(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))
  sylbi(wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
  df-ral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))
  ex(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))
  sylbir(wa(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wal(s0, wa(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
  19.27v(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  alimi(s0, wa(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))
  imp(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))
  3syl(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))
  pm2.04(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  biimprd(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, s1, c0)
  pm2.83(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  pm2.04(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: 2rexsb
blocks.content: An equivalent expression for double restricted existence, analogous to ~ rexsb . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2rexsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c1, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  bitri(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c1, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0))))), wrex(s3, c1, wrex(s0, c0, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))))
  bitri(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s3, c1, wrex(s0, c0, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s3, c1, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))))
  rexbii(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0), wrex(s3, c1, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))))
  rexsb(s1, s3, c1, w0)
  rexcom(s0, s3, c0, c1, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))
  bitri(wrex(s3, c1, wrex(s0, c0, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c1, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0))))), wrex(s3, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0))))))
  rexbii(s3, c1, wrex(s0, c0, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))), wrex(s2, c0, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0)))))
  bitri(wrex(s0, c0, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))), wrex(s2, c0, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0)))), wrex(s2, c0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))))))
  rexsb(s0, s2, c0, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))
  rexbii(s2, c0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0))))
  albii(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))), wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0)))
  bitr2i(wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))), wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0)), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))))
  albii(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))
  impexp(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)
  19.21v(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))
  rexcom(s3, s2, c1, c0, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0))))
  diff.wal.s(s2, s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))
  diff.wi.s(s2, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s1), cv(s3))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s3)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
}

blocks.name: 2rexrsb
blocks.content: An equivalent expression for double restricted existence, analogous to ~ 2exsb . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2rexrsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  bitri(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0))))), wrex(s3, c1, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))))
  bitri(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s3, c1, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s3, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))))
  rexbii(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0), wrex(s3, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))))
  rexrsb(s1, s3, c1, w0)
  rexcom(s0, s3, c0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))
  bitri(wrex(s3, c1, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0))))), wrex(s3, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0))))))
  rexbii(s3, c1, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))), wrex(s2, c0, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0)))))
  bitri(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))), wrex(s2, c0, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0)))), wrex(s2, c0, wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))))))
  rexrsb(s0, s2, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))
  rexbii(s2, c0, wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0)))
  bitr2i(wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0)), wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))))
  ralbii(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)))
  impexp(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)
  r19.21v(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))
  rexcom(s3, s2, c1, c0, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), w0))))
  diff.wral.s(s2, s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0))
  diff.wi.s(s2, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s1), cv(s3))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s3)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
}

blocks.name: cbvral2
blocks.content: Change bound variables of double restricted universal quantification, using implicit substitution, analogous to ~ cbvral2v . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvral2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0)), wral(s2, c0, wral(s3, c1, w1)))
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w2)
  -| wnf(s3, w2)
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wb(w2, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0)), wral(s2, c0, wral(s3, c1, w1)), wral(s2, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2)))
  cbvral(s0, s2, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0), wral(s1, c1, w2))
  nfral(s2, s1, c1, w0)
  nfcv(s2, c1)
  nfral(s0, s1, c1, w2)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  ralbidv(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), w0, w2)
  ralbii(s2, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2), wral(s3, c1, w1))
  cbvral(s1, s3, c1, w2, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvral2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w0))↔ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∀(s3 ∈ c1, w1)))
  ⊣ F/(s2, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w2)
  ⊣ F/(s3, w2)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w1)
  ⊣ (s0 = s2 →(w0 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s1 = s3 →(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
} = {
  bitri(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w0)), ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∀(s3 ∈ c1, w1)), ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w2)))
  cbvral(s0, s2, c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w0), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w2))
  nfral(s2, s1, c1, w0)
  nfcv(s2, c1)
  nfral(s0, s1, c1, w2)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  ralbidv(s1, c1, s0 = s2, w0, w2)
  ralbii(s2, c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w2), ∀(s3 ∈ c1, w1))
  cbvral(s1, s3, c1, w2, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: cbvrex2
blocks.content: Change bound variables of double restricted universal quantification, using implicit substitution, analogous to ~ cbvrex2v . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvrex2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c1, w1)))
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w2)
  -| wnf(s3, w2)
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wb(w2, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c1, w1)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w2)))
  cbvrex(s0, s2, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w2))
  nfrex(s2, s1, c1, w0)
  nfcv(s2, c1)
  nfrex(s0, s1, c1, w2)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  rexbidv(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), w0, w2)
  rexbii(s2, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w2), wrex(s3, c1, w1))
  cbvrex(s1, s3, c1, w2, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvrex2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w0))↔ ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c1, w1)))
  ⊣ F/(s2, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w2)
  ⊣ F/(s3, w2)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w1)
  ⊣ (s0 = s2 →(w0 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s1 = s3 →(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
} = {
  bitri(∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w0)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c1, w1)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w2)))
  cbvrex(s0, s2, c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w0), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w2))
  nfrex(s2, s1, c1, w0)
  nfcv(s2, c1)
  nfrex(s0, s1, c1, w2)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  rexbidv(s1, c1, s0 = s2, w0, w2)
  rexbii(s2, c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w2), ∃(s3 ∈ c1, w1))
  cbvrex(s1, s3, c1, w2, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: 2ralbiim
blocks.content: Split a biconditional and distribute 2 quantifiers, analogous to ~ 2albiim and ~ ralbiim . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jul-2017.)

blocks.name: ralndv1
blocks.content: Example for a theorem about a restricted universal quantification in which the restricting class depends on (actually is) the bound variable: All sets containing themselves contain the universal class. (Contributed by AV, 24-Jun-2023.)

blocks.name: ralndv2
blocks.content: Second example for a theorem about a restricted universal quantification in which the restricting class depends on the bound variable: all subsets of a set are sets. (Contributed by AV, 24-Jun-2023.)
